events.message: I received my order last week, but I was hoping to return it and get a refund because the product wasn’t what I expected.
The customer reported a refund request; the issue is categorized under Refund as it involves returning a product for money back.
Assigning customer support agent to handle the refund request and communicate next steps to the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I’m here to assist you with your refund inquiry.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know the reason why you want to return the product?
The order number is 123456789. I want to return it because the item did not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a return for you and process a full refund once we receive the item back. I will send you the prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great! I appreciate the quick help and will ship the item back as soon as I get the label.
We have received the returned item and your refund has been processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just following up to confirm that your refund was received satisfactorily. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting customer support, and we hope to serve you better next time.
